data.caption:
Board Meeting Intimation for A) Standalone And Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025; And
B) Declaration Of Second Interim Dividend For The Financial Year 2025-26 To The Equity Shareholders Of The
data.news_body: 360 ONE WAM LTDhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 17/10/2025 inter alia to consider and approve standalone and consolidated unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025 and declaration of second interim dividend for the financial year 2025-26 to the equity shareholders of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Memorandum of Understanding /Agreements
data.news_body:
We refer to intimation dated April 22 2025 with regards to execution of Business Transfer Agreements between a) 360 ONE Distribution Services Limited Credit Suisse Securities (India) Pvt. Ltd. and UBS AG and b) 360 ONE Portfolio Managers Ltd Credit Suisse Securities (India) Pvt. Ltd. and UBS AG. (collectively  referred as BTAs)

We wish to inform you that upon receipt of all necessary approvals and no objections of regulatory authorities and fulfilment of the conditions laid down in the respective BTAs the parties on September 29 2025 have consummated the BTAs.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Dated May 18, 2021, Pursuant To Regulation 30 And 33 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations ')
data.news_body:
We would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today inter-alia considered and approved the following;

1. The Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021, alongwith the audit report of the statutory Auditors of the company.

2. Raising of funds through issuance of Non- Convertible Debentures (NCDs) on Private Placement basis upto Rs. 250 Crores subject to approval of shareholders.

3. The revised Insider Trading Policy of the Company and its subsidiaries.

The intimation in this regard is attached herewith
